meanings.definition: The date on which a television or radio program is scheduled to be broadcast.
meanings.sent1: The airdate for the new show is next Monday.
meanings.sent2: I always mark the airdate of my favorite TV series on the calendar.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting the airdate of the season finale would be a TV lover's nightmare.
meanings.sent4: The airdate of the live concert broadcast was a date to remember.
meanings.sent5: The airdate of the special episode was finally announced after much anticipation.

meanings.definition: To schedule or announce the date on which a television or radio program will be broadcast.
meanings.sent1: They will airdate the new series on Friday nights.
meanings.sent2: The network will airdate the season premiere next month.
meanings.sent3: I wonder who gets to decide and airdate the reruns of old shows.
meanings.sent4: The radio station will airdate the interview with the famous singer.
meanings.sent5: The team will airdate the documentary about wildlife conservation efforts.
